title: Grace Potter Tickets: CapitalCityTickets.com is Slashing Their Prices on Grace Potter Concert Tickets for her 2015 Tour Dates for Cities like Buffalo, Concord, and Philadelphia
text:
Grace Potter concert tickets for her 2015 tour dates are on sale now for cities like Buffalo, Concord, and Philadelphia. Trusted secondary ticket market provider CapitalCityTickets.com is providing Grace Potter fans with a promo code CITY5 to save an additional 5% on all orders.
CapitalCityTickets.com carries a wide selection of Grace Potter tickets at affordable prices. Grace Potter is hitting the road in December of 2015 and kicking it all off on December 2nd in Englewood, NJ.
Potter will be out in support of her new album, Midnight.
CLICK HERE to browse all levels of seating for Grace Potter concerts at CapitalCityTickets.com.
There isn't an event you will see this year that has the same exciting atmosphere as a live Grace Potter concert.
CapitalCityTickets.com already offers slashed ticket prices on all their ticket inventory. You can save an additional percentage off by using promo code provided.
Follow on Social Media for Special Deals and Discounts
